src:
Spravili so se na spomenik
07 Nov 2019, 19:38 by Ambrož Sardoč

Med vsakodnevnimi pogovori so se najbrž mnogi Kanalci danes spraševali, čemu so se minulo noč že drugič v dveh letih neznanci znesli nad spomenikom NOB na desnem bregu Soče ob robu mosta čez reko.



Foto: Ambrož Sardoč

KANAL > Skoraj vsa ploščad spomenika je zdaj porumenela, po bližnji Kolodvorski ulici pa vodi sled do vhoda v hišo gospe, ki skrbi za snažnost spomenika. Kot bi ji hotel kdo kaj sporočiti. Škoda je hujša kot ob prvem poškodovanju lani, odpravljala jo bo občina, ki mora zato prej izbrati izvajalca del. Županja Tina Gerbec je povedala, da bodo poškodovanje prijavili. Ali bodo našli krivca, je druga zgodba, policija je bila o primeru obveščena in je odvzela vzorce snovi, ki je poškodovala kamnito ploščad. Mogoče je, da sploh ne gre za barvo.
text:
They made their way to the monument
07 Nov 2019, 19:38 by Ambroz Sardoc

During the daily conversations, many Kanalis probably wondered why, for the second time in two years, strangers stood over the National Liberation War on the right bank of the Soča River at the edge of the bridge across the river.



Photo: Ambroz Sardoc

CHANNEL> Almost all the platform of the monument is now yellow, and along the nearby Kolodvorska street it leads to the entrance to the house of the lady, who takes care of the strength of the monument. As if anyone wanted to tell her something. The damage is more severe than the first injury last year, and will be eliminated by the municipality, which must therefore first select a contractor. Mayors Tina Gerbec said they would report the damage. Whether they will find the culprit is another story, police have been informed of the case and have taken samples of a substance that damaged a stone platform. It may be that it is not a color at all.
